description: Continued fraction expansion of Sierpi≈Ñski's Constant.
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 122-126.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,5000
prog: (PARI) contfrac(-Pi*log(Pi)+2*Pi*Euler+4*Pi*log(gamma(3/4)))(PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 5500); x=contfrac(-Pi*log(Pi)+2*Pi*Euler+4*Pi*log(gamma(3/4))); for (n=1, 5000, write("b062083.txt", n, " ", x[n])) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 01 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 27 2001
